title: Electric potential difference between X and Y

content.question: A uniform electric field <math> <mover accent="true"> <mi>E</mi> <mo>→</mo> </mover> </math> of magnitude 6,000 V/m exists in a region of space as shown above. What is the electric potential difference, Vx – VY , between points X and Y ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
